definitions.definition: The act of cleaning a surface by rubbing it with a brush, soap and water.
Diarrhea . ( Now used only of livestock, though also sometimes used of humans into the 1600s. )
Erosion by water, especially in watercourses .

main_definition: The act of cleaning a surface by rubbing it with a brush, soap and water.
secondary_definitions: Diarrhea . ( Now used only of livestock, though also sometimes used of humans into the 1600s. )
Erosion by water, especially in watercourses .
